SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm

Class MonitoredVMex

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Vm
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm.VMex
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm.MonitoredVMex
Direct Known Subclasses:
HddVm
public class MonitoredVMex extends VMex
A type of virtual machine, which keeps track of its performance. This VM relies on an external entity (e.g. a broker) to notify it of its observed utilisation. The VM keeps track of the notifications and then defines its utilisation for a given time as the mean of the observations for the last summaryLength seconds. The summaryLength parameter is specified in the constructors.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

      ramUtil - - the RAM utilisation. Must be in the range [0,1];
      diskUtil - - the Disk utilisation. Must be in the range [0,1];

    • getAveragedUtil

      public double[] getAveragedUtil()
      Returns the current utilisation as a array of numbers in the range [0,1] in the from [cp_util, ram_util, disk_util]. NOTE calling methods should not modify the resulting array, as a shallow copy may be returned!
      Returns:
      the current utilisation as a array of numbers in the range [0,1] in the from [cp_util, ram_util, disk_util].

    • clone

      public MonitoredVMex clone(CloudletScheduler scheduler)
      Description copied from class: VMex
      Makes a deep copy of this VM. The only properties which are not copied are the id, the scheduler, the status, and the submission/start/end times. The id of the resulting VM is uniquely generated and the scheduler is provided as a parameter.
      Overrides:
      clone in class VMex
      Parameters:
      scheduler - - must not be null. Must be a valid scheduler.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of this VM.

    • getMonitoredData

      public MonitoredVMex.MonitoredData getMonitoredData()
      Returns the internal data structure, containing the monitored utilisation data. Use only for testing purposes!
      Returns:
      the internal data structure, containing the monitored utilisation data.
